short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I said maybe when the user clicks on the word 'maybe'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Very simple extension for fans of 90's britpop who also don't really like meetings. Simply install and hit "maybe" on your next meeting invite. Adds a little swagger for your ears only.
